text: Eghtɨ kɨ nɨ batueghtɨ nɨ ua gumazamiziba ko ikian kogham. Nɨ mangɨ asɨzir atiaba ko ikiam. Egh nɨ 7plan azenibar, bulmakaubar mɨn dadabar amam. Nɨ kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ dughiar nɨ fogh suam, Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim bar gumazamizibagh atifa. A uabɨ uan ifongiamɨn, gumazibagh amima me atrivibar otifi.”
